name: sistema-usuarios-equipes
description: Sistema completo de gerenciamento de usuÃ¡rios e equipes

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run dev" "cd web && npm run dev"
scripts.build: cd server && npm install && npx prisma generate && cd ../web && npm install && npm run build
scripts.render:build: cd server && npm install && npx prisma generate && cd ../web && npm install && npm run build
scripts.render:start: cd server && npx prisma migrate deploy && npm run seed && npm start
